code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Modal=_ref=>{let{product,isOpen,onClose}=_ref;if(!isOpen||!product)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-close",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-image-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name,className:"modal-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-info-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"modal-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"modal-description",children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-sizes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Available Sizes & Prices"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sizes-list",children:product.sizes.map((size,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"size-option",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"size-name",children:size.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"size-price",children:["$",size.price.toFixed(2)]})]},index))})]})]})]})]})});};export default Modal;
